comments:
Using I20060131-1200.

For no obvious reason, the Plug-in Manifest editor has started giving me an error trying to open the following MANIFEST.MF file:

-----
Manifest-Version: 1.0
Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2
Bundle-Name: Http Plug-in
Bundle-SymbolicName: baldwin.ron.http
Bundle-Version: 0.0.1
Bundle-Activator: baldwin.ron.http.Activator
Bundle-Localization: plugin
Import-Package: javax.servlet;version="2.3.0",
 javax.servlet.http;version="2.3.0",
 org.osgi.framework;version="1.3.0",
 org.osgi.service.component;version="1.0.0",
 org.osgi.service.http;version="1.2.0",
 org.osgi.service.log;version="1.3.0",
 org.osgi.service.prefs;version="1.1.0",
 org.osgi.service.useradmin;version="1.1.0"
Service-Component: OSGI-INF/activator.xml
-----

Here is what shows instead of the editor:

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 114955 ***
